## strEnsureSuffix() function

确保字符串有特定后缀，没有则添加

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function strEnsureSuffix(s: string, suffix: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  s | string | 字符串 |
|  suffix | string | 后缀 |

**Returns:**

string

确保有后缀的字符串
